typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empno as integer,
		ename as string,
		job as string,
		sal as decimal(19,4),
		comm as decimal(19,4),
		deptno as integer,
		hiredate as date,
		mgr as integer,
		total as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(deptno==10,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(deptno10, RestAllDepts)
ConditionalSplit1@deptno10 sort(asc(empno, false),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
ConditionalSplit1@RestAllDepts filter(deptno!=40) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(empno, false)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
